item.title: Motivation system for my kids
item.description: Motivation system for my kids [[ABOUT/Roles/Father]] It is in constant development so it might change over time. What I tried Schedules - created a weekly schedules on which kids could track their progress and show me how they did.

item.title: How i read books
item.description: I hate to read Since beginning of my life I didn’t like to read and until now I wasn’t able to change it.

item.title: About
item.description: About Hello! I’m Pawel Lipowczan. Software Engineer, Developer and Architect from Poland, Ustron. I have rich experience in web, desktop and mobile development.

item.title: Habits
item.description: Habits Aktualnie Rano (6:20): Walking the dog (10 min) Wim Hoff’s WHM breathing exercises or Meditation - relaxation, counting breaths, mindfulness (15 min) Celery juice or water with lemon (10 min) Brushing teeth (left hand) (5 min) Tabata (5 min) Cold shower (5 min) Walking with autiobook/podcast (20 min) Breakfast (20 min) Rozpoczęcie pracy 8:00 Task planning (10 min) Journaling - [[KNOWLEDGES/5 minute journal]] (10 min) Own work (1 hour)
